explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a novel Hierarchical Graph Neural Network (TH-GNN) for financial risk assessment, which is a machine learning approach.
explanations.neural network: The method involves a Hierarchical Graph Neural Network, which is a type of neural network.
explanations.deep learning: The proposed TH-GNN is a deep learning model designed for tribe-style graphs.
explanations.representation learning: The model learns representations of companies and their relationships through hierarchical graph neural networks.
explanations.Graph Neural Networks: The paper explicitly mentions the use of Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) for processing tribe-style graphs.
explanations.GNNs: Abbreviation for Graph Neural Networks, which are central to the proposed method.
explanations.contrastive learning: The first level of the TH-GNN uses contrastive learning to encode the structure pattern of the tribes.
